page.title: 04RECREATION IN MIDDLETON
page.content: Facilities in Middleton are fairly comprehensive in scope though the { {quantity}is inadequate considering the population of the area. The town is well served with a recently renovated public baths and a new sports centre on the same site. Within this complex, tennis, squash, badminton, volleyball, snooker etc. are all catered for. There are facilities for outdoor football games at the town hall grounds where tennis is also played. Middleton has its own cricket club at Towncroft and golf is played at N.Manchester Golf Club. Golf can also be practised at the driving range in Bowlee. Fishing is enjoyed at Rhodes with several lodges for club members and the local canal also provides sport. Woodland at Alkrington and Hopwood can be enjoyed by all ages.
